sources.title: Strictly Business
sources.description:
Based on O. Henry's short stories "The Roads We Take", "Soul Mates" and "The Red Chief".

Year of production: 1962

Director: Leonid Gaidai
Screenwriter: Leonid Gaidai
Composer: Georgy Firtich
Director of photography: Konstantin Brovin
Production designer: Vladimir Kaplunovsky

Cast: Georgy Vitsin, Alexey Smirnov, Yuri Nikulin, Alexander Shvorin, Rostislav Plyatt, Vladlen Paulus, Seryozha Tikhonov, Viktor Gromov
